content: Looking to sell the newest release from Kialara. Overextended myself and need to recoup some funds for life reasons.May be interested in a partial trade plus btc depending on the offer but mostly looking for the btc as I need the funds.First time seller on here. Escrow available at buyers discretion and expense. Item is located and will be shipped from the USLooking to get .1btcShipping would be included within the US if not using escrow, and I would ask that anyone outside the US pay for the cost of shipping and escrow(cost can be calculated)Pictures Â with username and date can be seen here:https://ibb.co/Xj6x40Mhttps://ibb.co/cvtnVj2https://ibb.co/8dy4r6FPlease feel free to ask any questions!

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Just my 2c:0.1 BTC is currently 2.340 USD and going up (for the moment).These (undoubtedly gorgeous) things are still for sale for 2.500 USD, international shipping included.I'd say an auction is your best chance here, but I personally wouldn't expect getting over say 0.07, likely less.Sorry.
